remarks: The property of being an undirected hypergraph represented as an ordered pair.  The representation as an ordered pair is the usual representation of a graph, see section I.1 of [Bollobas] p. 1.  (Contributed by AV, 1-Jan-2020.)
statement: uhgraop $p |- ( ( V e. W /\ E e. X ) -> ( <. V , E >. e. UHGrph <-> E : dom E --> ( ~P V \ { (/) } ) ) ) $.
